"Afin": "Well, you've arrived at the ruins. ...this place is really crawling with Darkers."
"Which reminds me, the first time we met was the final trial here on Naberius, wasn't it?"
"I'll never forget that Darker invasion. Even so, you've helped me in so many ways, even getting us here."
"Tch, it's not the time to be talking like this, right?! Let's begin this request!"
